nodes.text: The Self-Propelled Heavy Artillery-Concussion missile launcher (SPHA-C) was a version of the Self-Propelled Heavy Artillery used by the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. It was equipped with a concussion missile launcher as the main weapon, which was augmented by 12 anti-personnel blasters. While powerful, the SPHA-C also had to manage its ammunition carefully like all of its other cousins.
